workshoptitle: Easily stream changed data from on premises to Autonomous Database with OCI GoldenGate

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create OCI GoldenGate resources
tutorials.description: Create your OCI GoldenGate deployment and database registration

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Connect Oracle GoldenGate to Autonomous Transaction Processing
tutorials.description: Connect Oracle GoldenGate to its Source Database

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a trusted connection between Oracle GoldenGate and OCI GoldenGate
tutorials.description: Use a self-signed certificate to create a trusted connection

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Send the Oracle GoldenGate Trail file to OCI GoldenGate
tutorials.description: Create an Extract, Distribution Path, and Replicat

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Monitor processes
tutorials.description: Verify all processes are running and sending data

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
